General.Name: Beijing Hotgen Biotech Co Ltd
General.Description: Beijing Hotgen Biotech Co., Ltd. engages in the research, development, manufacture, and sale of medical and public safety inspection products of in-vitro diagnostic products in the field of biomedicine. It offers drug detection, CDC, Up-conversion luminescence technology, colloidal gold, CLIA, sugar capture, microfluidic, and gene detection products for testing of intestinal microorganisms, gastrointestinal foodborne infections, insect-borne diseases, respiratory pathogens, infectious diseases, Ebola virus antigen, biological warfare agents, microorganisms, and mycotoxins. Beijing Hotgen Biotech Co., Ltd. was founded in 2005 and is based in Beijing, China.
General.Address: Zhongguancun High-end Medical Device Ind, Beijing, China, 102629
